content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the kinetic energy of the box at the bottom of the ramp?

choices.label: <math alttext="mu sub k, end sub, times m g L, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></math>

<math alttext="m g h minus mu sub k, end sub, times m g L, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></math>

<math alttext="m g L minus mu sub k, end sub, times m g L, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="m g h minus mu sub k, end sub, times m g L, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
